d2_dictionary.title: This dictionary represents implied relations (dm_relation objects) to be created automatically between a new artifact and existing artifacts in the repository, in an extensible / configurable way.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences eTMF Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution¬OpenText Life Sciences Submission Storage and Viewing

alias.name: Targets
alias.value: select r_object_id from cd_app_reg_labeling_doc where product_code = '$value(product_code)' and any application_descriptions in ($quotedvalue(application_descriptions)) and a_status != 'Withdrawn' and r_object_id !='$value(r_object_id)'

alias.name: Targets
alias.value: select r_object_id from cd_core_reg_labeling_doc where product_code = '$value(product_code)' and a_status != 'Withdrawn'

alias.name: Targets
alias.value: select r_object_id from cd_reg_admin_info where application_description in ($quotedvalue(application_descriptions))

alias.name: Targets
alias.value: SELECT r_object_id FROM cd_reg_submission_info WHERE r_object_id IN ($quotedvalue(submission_info_object_id))

alias.name: Targets
alias.value: select r_object_id from cd_app_reg_labeling_doc where product_code = '$value(product_code)' and a_status != 'Withdrawn'

alias.value: select r_object_id from cd_core_reg_labeling_doc where product_code = '$value(product_code)' and a_status != 'Withdrawn' and r_object_id !='$value(r_object_id)'

alias.name: Targets

alias.name: Targets
alias.value: SELECT r_object_id FROM cd_reg_submission_info WHERE r_object_id IN ($quotedvalue(submission_info_object_id))

alias.name: Targets
alias.value: select r_object_id from cd_reg_admin_info where application_description in ($quotedvalue(application_descriptions)) or application_description = '$value(application_description)'

alias.name: Targets
alias.value: select r_object_id from cd_reg_admin_info where a_status != 'Inactive' and (application_description in ($quotedvalue(application_descriptions)) or application_description = '$value(application_description)')
